In order to be fitter in the future, you should turn to spiritual healing methods now and not extinguish that light within you. Weakness is only in the mind.

The years ahead will pass with health, peace, and never-ending energy.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a great energy of completion and success in every field; you managed a phase of your life masterfully. You lived that 'golden age' in love, work, and health; you literally became one with the universe. The great happinesses you experienced and the victories you gained have matured your character and perspective on life. That period when all the pieces fell into place continues to be an inspiration for you even today. You are a soul who graduated from the school of life with a certificate of merit.
hepsi.simdi: Right now, it's a time of celebration for you in every area of life; everything is progressing exactly as it should! Peace in love, success in work, abundance in the wallet, and health in the body have come together. It's normal for you to feel like you're at the center of the world because the universe is revolving for you right now, darling. You are in that magnificent balance where nothing is missing and every desire comes true one by one. Feel the taste of this sense of wholeness in every moment, because this is the victory of your soul.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future promises a magnificent wholeness where you will reach the peak in every area of life, darling. While you climb to the top in your career, you will also embrace that great happiness with your soulmate in love. A period where financial worries vanish and your health shines brightly is waiting for you. That moment when all your dreams merge and turn into a single big reality will be the end of your 'world tour' and a new beginning. The universe is preparing to offer you all its gifts at the same time, get ready!

ask.gecmis: Darling, in your past, it felt like a relationship didn't quite end when it was supposed to, or something always remained unfinished. Because you couldn't close an emotional cycle, a corner of your heart has always ached with that feeling of incompleteness. The obstacles that got in the way when you thought you found your soulmate might have disappointed you. This unfinished story from that period has somewhat tired your perspective on love. It's as if the world stopped but you are still stuck on that old page.
ask.simdi: Right indi, you feel that things in your love life are not falling into place and you can't quite say 'it's done.' An old cycle is about to be completed in your relationship or your loneliness, but you seem afraid to take that final step. Perhaps the shadow of an old love still falls on your today and prevents a new beginning. To feel complete, you first need to complete the missing pieces within yourself. Love is knocking at your door, but you are still waiting on the threshold, honey.
ask.gelecek: In your future, some delays in the name of love and processes that cannot be completed might challenge you a bit. To reach that great happiness you seek, you will need to pass through a few more tests and be patient. The fact that bonds that need to break do not break might slow down your progress for a while longer. However, this situation is an opportunity for you to learn a bigger lesson and return to love with a firmer foundation. If you are patient, that missing piece will eventually fall into place.

is.gecmis: In your past, obstacles that appeared at the last moment when you were about to reach full success in business left your enthusiasm in your throat. It must have been tiring for you not to be able to finish a project or not to receive that great promotion you expected. Those days when you felt trapped in a cycle on your career path were a time when you couldn't fully reflect your potential. Missing documents, endless meetings, and words left in the air consumed your energy quite a bit. You missed victory by a hair's breadth in that period, darling.
is.simdi: Honey, right now you feel like you are trying to catch up with things in your business life but always running late. You want to close a cycle in your career and move on to a new one, but something is constantly pulling you back. You have talent, you have power, but you can't get full efficiency due to focus problems or external factors. Now is the time to stop and ask, 'where am I making a mistake?' because repeating the same mistakes tires you. Success is waiting at the door, but you are turning the key in the wrong hole.
is.gelecek: In your future, some bureaucratic obstacles or postponed projects might annoy you as you reach your career goals. The road to that great success you want might be a bit more winding and tiring than you expected. You will realize that the works you thought were completed actually require more effort. Don't let this process daunt you; it's just whispering that you need to act more carefully and strategically. Reaching the goal will take some time, but what you learn while walking that path will be priceless.

para.gecmis: In your past, expenses that never seemed to end and the delay of the earnings you expected in a financial sense challenged you. As if the abundance of money was cut off somewhere, you went through a period where you had difficulty protecting what you had. You might have dealt with debts because you couldn't fully receive the returns on your investments or close a financial cycle. This sense of deficiency in that period causes you to act more cautiously toward money today. An unfinished financial dream has affected you deeply.
para.simdi: Right now, you might feel as if there is a hole in your wallet, darling; money comes but goes as fast as it arrives. You can't seem to provide that security and wholeness you want financially. Perhaps old debts or unending payments deprive you of the current energy of abundance. This difficulty you experience in managing money is actually a reflection of some other imbalances in your life. You are in a period where you need to be a bit more planned and realistic; avoid drifting.
para.gelecek: In your future, the fulfillment of your financial expectations might take longer than you expected and some of your financial plans might be interrupted. You are standing in front of a big gate of earnings, but there are some documents or conditions that are not yet ready to open that gate. Acting impatiently might drag you into financial losses, so you must be very careful in your investments. To reach the energy of abundance, you will first need to clear your current deficiencies and debts. Wealth is on the horizon, but the road is a bit foggy.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you experienced a period where health problems recurred or a healing process could not be completed. Those days when you felt like you were about to feel fine but your energy dropped and physical fatigue didn't end must have worn you down considerably. Interruptions in treatment processes or small complaints that couldn't be diagnosed might have lowered your quality of life. This 'half-finished wellness' state from those days shook your confidence in your health. You couldn't quite achieve peace with your body back then.
saglik.simdi: Darling, right now you might feel a bit exhausted and spiritually incomplete. Your body is giving you some signals, but you seem to prefer ignoring them. Your energy never reaches its peak; something always feels missing or lagging. Perhaps you started a treatment but didn't finish it, or you are constantly breaking your diet. To have complete health, you must be determined and absolutely complete the healing journey you have started.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a process where you need to be a bit more attentive and disciplined regarding health issues awaits you. Small glitches you neglect might cause bigger trouble later on, so never skip your check-ups. The door of healing is open to you, but you need to make an effort to walk through that door and focus on your physical wholeness. Some chronic fatigues or seasonal illnesses might slow you down for a while. You must turn taking good care of yourself into a lifestyle, not a task.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general sense of 'incompleteness'; it's as if everything was about to be perfect but something remained missing. In love, in your work, and in your health, you could never take that final step; you felt trapped in a vicious cycle. Dreaming big and going halfway only to have to stop has tired your soul a lot. These uncertainties from that period trigger the fear of 'I wonder if it will remain unfinished again?' even today. You couldn't fully establish your own world in those days, honey.
hepsi.simdi: Right now, you might feel that you haven't reached a point of complete satisfaction in any area of your life, darling. Things are progressing but at a snail's pace; there's love but a void inside; health is fine but energy is low... This scattered energy prevents you from focusing and makes you unhappy. It's as if a most important piece of a puzzle is missing and you don't know where to look for it. Now is the time to stop and clear all the glitches in your life one by one and join the missing pieces.
hepsi.gelecek: In your future, some glitches and delays in the general rhythm of life might be waiting for you, darling. It will take a bit more time and effort for those big changes you planned to happen. Instead of expecting everything to be perfect all at once, you should accept progressing step by step. The obstacles you encounter in this process are actually small universe tests that check your patience and determination. Remember, the greatest successes come after the longest and most difficult roads.
